[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-geoutils](./harp-geoutils.md) &gt; [QuadTree](./harp-geoutils.quadtree.md) &gt; [(constructor)](./harp-geoutils.quadtree._constructor_.md)

## QuadTree.(constructor)

Constructs a new `QuadTree` for the given \[\[TilingScheme\]\].

Example:

```typescript
const quadTree = new QuadTree(hereTilingScheme);
const geoBox = quadTree.getGeoBox(tileKey);
console.log(geoBox.center);

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(tilingScheme: TilingScheme);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tilingScheme | [TilingScheme](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.md) | The TilingScheme used by this <code>QuadTree</code>. |
